case_title: United States of America v. Tran et al
case_info_full_case_name: United States of America v. Tran et al

charges.charge_description: 21:841(c)(2) &; 18:2 KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY DISTRIBUTING PSEUDOEPHEDRINE, A LISTED CHEMICAL, KNOWING AND HAVING REASONABLE CAUSE TO BELIEVE THAT IT WILL BE USED TO MANUFACTURE A CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE; AIDING AND ABETTING(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft sentenced to custody of Bureau of Prisons for a term of 36 months as to each of counts 1,3,4,6 &; 7 to be served concurrently with one another; Supervised release for 3 years on each count to run concurrently; Dft ordered to pay a fine in the amount of ,500.00; S/A fee .00 due immediately;
